trans-unit.source: Represents any time zone in the world.
trans-unit.target: 表示世界上的任何时区。

trans-unit.source: A time zone is a geographical region in which the same time is used.
trans-unit.target: 时区指使用相同时间的某个地理区域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> class offers significant enhancements over the <xref:System.TimeZone> class, which provides only limited functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>类相比，提供的重大增强功能<xref:System.TimeZone>类，该类提供只有有限的功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeZone> class recognizes only the local time zone, and can convert times between Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and local time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZone>类识别仅本地时区，并可以转换协调世界时 (UTC) 和当地时间之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object can represent any time zone, and methods of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> class can be used to convert the time in one time zone to the corresponding time in any other time zone.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象可以表示任何时区和方法的<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>类可以用于将一个时区的时间转换为其他时区中的相应时间。

trans-unit.source: The members of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> class support the following operations:
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>类支持以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Retrieving a time zone that is already defined by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 正在检索已由操作系统定义的时区。

trans-unit.source: Enumerating the time zones that are available on a system.
trans-unit.target: 枚举在系统可用的时区。

trans-unit.source: Converting times between different time zones.
trans-unit.target: 转换不同时区之间的时间。

trans-unit.source: Creating a new time zone that is not already defined by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的时区不由操作系统已定义。

trans-unit.source: Serializing a time zone for later retrieval.
trans-unit.target: 序列化时区，以供将来检索。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> class is immutable.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>类是不可变。

trans-unit.source: Once an object has been instantiated, its values cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 一旦已实例化一个对象，不能修改其值。

trans-unit.source: You cannot instantiate a <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object using the `new` keyword.
trans-unit.target: 无法实例化<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象使用`new`关键字。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you must call one of the static members of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> class shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 相反，您必须调用的静态成员之一<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>下表中所示的类。

trans-unit.source: Static member name
trans-unit.target: 静态成员名称

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A> method
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A> 方法

trans-unit.source: Creates a custom time zone from application-supplied data.
trans-unit.target: 从应用程序提供的数据创建自定义时区。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A> method
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A> 方法

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a time zone defined in the system registry based on the zone's identifier.
trans-unit.target: 实例化基于区域的标识符的系统注册表中定义的时区。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A> method
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A> 方法

trans-unit.source: Deserializes a string value to re-create a previously serialized <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 反序列化一个字符串值可重新创建以前序列化<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones%2A> method
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones%2A> 方法

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> objects that represents all time zones that are available on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个可枚举对象<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>的<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>表示在本地系统上可用的所有时区的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A> 属性

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object that represents the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 实例化<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象，表示本地时区。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc%2A> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc%2A> 属性

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object that represents the UTC zone.
trans-unit.target: 实例化<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象，表示 UTC 区域。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A> method to create a time zone that is not defined in the local system registry.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A>方法来创建未在本地系统注册表中定义的时区。

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ToSerializedString%2A> property to save the time zone object's information as a string, which can be stored in some form that is accessible to the application.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ToSerializedString%2A>将时区对象的信息另存为一个字符串，可以存储在应用程序可以访问某种形式的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A> method to convert a serialized string back to a <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A>方法将序列化的字符串转换回<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time difference between the current time zone's standard time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 获取当前时区的标准时间与协调世界时 (UTC) 之间的时差。

trans-unit.source: An object that indicates the time difference between the current time zone's standard time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它指示当前时区的标准时间与协调世界时 (UTC) 之间的时差。

trans-unit.source: The time span returned by the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A> property can range from 14 hours (for a time zone that is 14 hours ahead of Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)) to -14 hours (for a time zone that is 14 hours behind UTC).
trans-unit.target: 返回的时间跨度<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A>属性介于 14 小时 （对于为 14 小时之前协调世界时 (UTC) 的时区） 到-14 小时 （对于为 14 小时后面 UTC 时区）。

trans-unit.source: Time zones that are ahead of UTC have a positive offset; time zones that are behind UTC have a negative offset.
trans-unit.target: 早于 utc 时间的时区具有负的偏移量;后面 UTC 的时区具有负的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A> value is represented as a whole number of minutes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A>值表示为整分钟数。

trans-unit.source: It cannot include a fractional number of minutes.
trans-unit.target: 它不能包含小数部分组成的分钟数。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A> is a property of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object rather than the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule> object, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> class applies a single offset from UTC to all of a time zone's adjustments.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A>是的一个属性<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象而不是<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule>对象，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>类将单个偏移量从 UTC 应用于所有时区的调整。

trans-unit.source: To reflect a time zone that has modified its offset from UTC, you must create a new time zone using the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以反映已修改其相对于 UTC 的时区，必须创建新的时区使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A> property differs from the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetUtcOffset%2A> method in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A>属性不同于<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetUtcOffset%2A>通过以下方式的方法：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A> property returns the difference between UTC and the time zone's standard time; the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetUtcOffset%2A> method returns the difference between UTC and the time zone's time at a particular point in time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A>属性返回 UTC 和时区的标准时间; 之间的差异<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetUtcOffset%2A>方法时，返回 UTC 和某个特定点的时区的时间之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetUtcOffset%2A> method reflects the application of any adjustment rules to the time zone; the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A> property does not.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetUtcOffset%2A>方法反映到时区; 的任何调整规则的应用程序<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A>属性却没有。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A> property to display the difference between the local time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.BaseUtcOffset%2A>属性显示本地时间和协调世界时 (UTC) 之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: Clears cached time zone data.
trans-unit.target: 清除已缓存的时区数据。

trans-unit.source: Cached time zone data includes data on the local time zone, the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) zone, and any time zones that are retrieved by using methods such as <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A> and <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 已缓存的时区数据包括上的本地时区、 协调世界时 (UTC) 区域中和使用方法类似于检索任何时区数据<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A>和<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You might call the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ClearCachedData%2A> method to reduce the memory devoted to the application's cache of time zone information or to reflect the fact that the local system's time zone has changed.
trans-unit.target: 您可能要调用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ClearCachedData%2A>方法，以减少内存专门用于应用程序的缓存的时区信息，或以反映本地系统时区已更改的事实。

trans-unit.source: Storing references to the local and UTC time zones is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 不建议存储对本地和 UTC 时区的引用。

trans-unit.source: After the call to the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ClearCachedData%2A> method, these object variables will be undefined <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> objects that are no longer references to <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在调用后<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ClearCachedData%2A>方法，这些对象变量将是未定义<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>不再对引用的对象<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the following code, the second call to the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> because the `local` variable is no longer considered equal to <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的代码中的第二次调用到<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法抛出异常<xref:System.ArgumentException>因为`local`变量不再被视为等于<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Converts a time to the time in a particular time zone.
trans-unit.target: 将时间转换为特定时区的时间。

trans-unit.source: The date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The time zone to convert <c>dateTime</c> to.
trans-unit.target: <c>dateTime</c> 要转换到的时区。

trans-unit.source: Converts a time to the time in a particular time zone.
trans-unit.target: 将时间转换为特定时区的时间。

trans-unit.source: The date and time in the destination time zone.
trans-unit.target: 目标时区的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: When performing the conversion, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29> method applies any adjustment rules in effect in the `destinationTimeZone` time zone.
trans-unit.target: 当执行转换，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29>方法适用实际上在任何调整规则`destinationTimeZone`时区。

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29> method determines the source time zone from the value of the `dateTime` parameter's <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property, as the following table shows.
trans-unit.target: 此重载<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29>方法确定的值与源时区`dateTime`参数的<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: Kind property value
trans-unit.target: 类型的属性值

trans-unit.source: Source time zone
trans-unit.target: 源时区

trans-unit.source: Method behavior
trans-unit.target: 方法行为

trans-unit.source: Converts the local time to the time in `destinationTimeZone`.
trans-unit.target: 将本地时间转换为中的时间`destinationTimeZone`。

trans-unit.source: Converts Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to the time in `destinationTimeZone`.
trans-unit.target: 将协调世界时 (UTC) 中的时间转换为`destinationTimeZone`。

trans-unit.source: Assumed to be <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 假定为<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the local time to the time in `destinationTimeZone`.
trans-unit.target: 将本地时间转换为中的时间`destinationTimeZone`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is set as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回的<xref:System.DateTime>下表中所示设置值。

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 条件

trans-unit.source: Returned Kind property value
trans-unit.target: 返回类型的属性值

trans-unit.source: The `destinationTimeZone` is <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: `destinationTimeZone` 为 <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The `destinationTimeZone` is <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: `destinationTimeZone` 为 <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: All other date and time values and destination time zones.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他日期和时间值和目标时区。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `dateTime` parameter is an ambiguous local time, it is interpreted as a standard time.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`dateTime`参数为明确的本地时间时，将其解释为标准时间。

trans-unit.source: If the `dateTime` parameter is an invalid local time, this method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dateTime`参数是无效的本地时间，此方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion of `dateTime` results in a date and time value that is earlier than <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or later than <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换`dateTime`结果日期和时间值早于<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>或晚于<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，此方法返回<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>分别。

trans-unit.source: You can also convert to or from UTC by calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeFromUtc%2A> and <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeToUtc%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以通过调用转换到或从 UTC<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeFromUtc%2A>和<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeToUtc%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an array of date and time values to times in the Eastern Time zone of the U.S. and Canada.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将日期和时间值的数组至时间转换在美国和加拿大的东部时间区域中。

trans-unit.source: It shows that the source time zone depends on the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the source <xref:System.DateTime> value.
trans-unit.target: 它显示与源时区依赖于<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的源属性<xref:System.DateTime>值。

trans-unit.source: It also illustrates that the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%2A> method takes time zone adjustments into account, because a time zone adjustment occurs in both the source and destination time zones at 2:00 A.M.
trans-unit.target: 它还阐释了<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%2A>方法采用时区调整到帐户，因为在凌晨 2:00 发生在源和目标时区的时区调整

trans-unit.source: on November 7, 2010.
The value of the <paramref name="dateTime" /> parameter represents an invalid time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dateTime" /> 参数值表示无效的时间。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> 参数的值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, this method recognizes only the current adjustment rule when performing the conversion if <paramref name="dateTime" /> is treated as a local time or if <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> is <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />.
trans-unit.target: 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系统，此方法只会识别当前调整规则时执行转换，如果<paramref name="dateTime" />视为本地时间或如果<paramref name="destinationTimeZone" />是<see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the method may not accurately convert times for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect.
trans-unit.target: 因此，该方法可能无法准确转换之前当前的调整规则生效的时间。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Notes for Callers section in the <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的调用节说明<see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />属性。

trans-unit.source: The date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The time zone to convert <c>dateTime</c> to.
trans-unit.target: <c>dateTime</c> 要转换到的时区。

trans-unit.source: Converts a time to the time in a particular time zone.
trans-unit.target: 将时间转换为特定时区的时间。

trans-unit.source: The date and time in the destination time zone.
trans-unit.target: 目标时区的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: When performing the conversion, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29> method applies any adjustment rules in effect in the `destinationTimeZone` time zone.
trans-unit.target: 当执行转换，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29>方法适用实际上在任何调整规则`destinationTimeZone`时区。

trans-unit.source: This overload differs from the other overloads of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%2A> method by accepting a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value as its first parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此重载区别的其他重载<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%2A>方法接受<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>作为其第一个参数的值。

trans-unit.source: This identifies the date and time as an offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) rather than as the date and time in a particular time zone.
trans-unit.target: 此标识的日期和时间与协调世界时 (UTC) 偏移量，而不是日期和时间以特定时区。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the `dateTimeOffset` parameter cannot represent either an ambiguous time or an invalid time.
trans-unit.target: 因此，`dateTimeOffset`参数不能表示不明确的时间无效。

trans-unit.source: In converting the `dateTimeOffset` value to the time in the destination time zone, this method takes into account any adjustment rules in effect in the destination time zone.
trans-unit.target: 在将转换`dateTimeOffset`为目标时区的此方法中的时间的值将考虑在内实际上目标时区的任何调整规则。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion of `dateTimeOffset` results in a date and time value that is earlier than <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or later than <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换`dateTimeOffset`结果日期和时间值早于<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>或晚于<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，此方法返回<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>分别。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts an array of <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values to times in the Eastern Time zone of the U.S. and Canada.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将数组转换<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>东部时区中的美国和加拿大时间值。

trans-unit.source: It illustrates that the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%2A> method takes time zone adjustments into account, because a time zone adjustment occurs in both the source and destination time zones at 2:00 A.M.
trans-unit.target: 它阐释了<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%2A>方法采用时区调整到帐户，因为在凌晨 2:00 发生在源和目标时区的时区调整

trans-unit.source: on November 7, 2010.
The value of the <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> 参数的值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, this method applies only the current adjustment rule to the time zone conversion if <paramref name="dateTimeOffset" /> is treated as a local time or if <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> is <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />.
trans-unit.target: 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系统，此方法将仅在当前的调整规则应用到时区转换如果<paramref name="dateTimeOffset" />视为本地时间或如果<paramref name="destinationTimeZone" />是<see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the method may not accurately convert times for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect.
trans-unit.target: 因此，该方法可能无法准确转换之前当前的调整规则生效的时间。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Notes for Callers section in the <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的调用节说明<see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />属性。

trans-unit.source: All other date and time values, source time zones, and destination time zones.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他日期和时间值、 源时区和目标时区。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `dateTime` parameter is an ambiguous time in the source time zone, it is interpreted as a standard time.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`dateTime`参数是源时区中不明确的时间，它被解释为标准时间。

trans-unit.source: If the `dateTime` parameter is an invalid time in the source time zone, this method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dateTime`参数是无效时间源时区中的，此方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion of `dateTime` results in a date and time value that is earlier than <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or later than <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换`dateTime`结果日期和时间值早于<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>或晚于<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，此方法返回<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>分别。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29> method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception if the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the `dateTime` argument is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType> but the `sourceTimeZone` argument is not <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29>方法抛出异常<xref:System.ArgumentException>异常如果<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性`dateTime`自变量是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>但`sourceTimeZone`参数不是<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the source time zone is the local time zone or the universal time zone, the method tests for reference equality instead of testing for value equality with the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Equals%28System.TimeZoneInfo%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定该方法是否与源时区为本地时区或世界时区，而不是对值相等性测试引用相等性测试<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Equals%28System.TimeZoneInfo%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> objects that represent the local time zone and that are retrieved by calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A> method do not have referential equality with <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象： 表示本地时区和，通过调用检索<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A>方法不具有引用相等性<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> objects that represent the local or universal time zone and that are retrieved by iterating the collection returned by the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones%2A> method do not have referential equality with <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象，表示本地或世界时区并循环访问返回的集合检索的<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones%2A>方法不具有引用相等性<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can call the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 作为替代方法，可以调用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29> method to convert from Hawaiian Standard Time to local time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29>方法将从夏威夷标准时间转换为本地时间。

trans-unit.source: This overload is largely identical to calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29> method, except that it allows you to specify the destination time zone by its identifier rather than by an object reference.

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves the time zone whose identifier is specified by the `destinationTimeZoneId` parameter from the registry.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检索其标识符指定的时区`destinationTimeZoneId`注册表中的参数。

trans-unit.source: It cannot retrieve a time zone object that is created using the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它不能检索使用创建的时区对象<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `destinationTimeZoneId` parameter must correspond exactly to the time zone's registry key in length, but not in case, for a successful match to occur; that is, the comparison of `destinationTimeZoneId` with time zone identifiers is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: `destinationTimeZoneId`参数必须精确对应于时区的注册表项的长度，但不是在情况下，若发生; 成功匹配，即比较`destinationTimeZoneId`时区标识符是不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: This overload is identical to calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29> method, except that it allows you to specify the destination time zone by its identifier rather than by an object reference.
trans-unit.target: 此重载等同于调用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29>方法，它允许你按其标识符而不是一个对象引用指定目标时区不同。

trans-unit.source: This method is most useful when you must convert a time without retrieving the time zone object that corresponds to it and you do not need to know whether the converted time is standard or daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: 当必须将时间转换而不检索与之相对应的时区对象而不需要知道转换后的时间是标准或夏时制，则此方法是最有用。

trans-unit.source: Because the `dateTimeOffset` parameter represents a date and time together with that time's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), it cannot represent either an ambiguous time or an invalid time.
trans-unit.target: 因为`dateTimeOffset`参数表示的日期和时间以及该时间偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)，它不能表示不明确的时间无效。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves the time zone whose identifier is specified by the `destinationTimeZoneId` parameter from the registry.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检索其标识符指定的时区`destinationTimeZoneId`注册表中的参数。

trans-unit.source: It cannot retrieve a time zone object that is created using the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它不能检索使用创建的时区对象<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `destinationTimeZoneId` parameter must correspond exactly to the time zone's registry key in length, but not in case, for a successful match to occur; that is, the comparison of `destinationTimeZoneId` with time zone identifiers is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: `destinationTimeZoneId`参数必须精确对应于时区的注册表项的长度，但不是在情况下，若发生; 成功匹配，即比较`destinationTimeZoneId`时区标识符是不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: In converting the `dateTimeOffset` value to the time in the destination time zone, the method takes into account any adjustment rules in effect in the destination time zone.
trans-unit.target: 在将转换`dateTimeOffset`为目标时区的方法中的时间的值将考虑在内实际上目标时区的任何调整规则。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion of `dateTimeOffset` results in a date and time value that is earlier than <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or later than <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, respectively.

trans-unit.source: The time zone identifier was found but the registry data is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 时区标识符已找到，但注册表数据已损坏。

trans-unit.source: The process does not have the permissions required to read from the registry key that contains the time zone information.
trans-unit.target: 该进程没有读取包含时区信息的注册表项所需的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="destinationTimeZoneId" /> identifier was not found on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 在本地系统上找不到 <paramref name="destinationTimeZoneId" /> 标识符。

trans-unit.source: The date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the source time zone.
trans-unit.target: 源时区的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the destination time zone.
trans-unit.target: 目标时区的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Converts a time from one time zone to another based on time zone identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 根据时区标识符将时间从一个时区转换到另一个时区。

trans-unit.source: The date and time in the destination time zone that corresponds to the <paramref name="dateTime" /> parameter in the source time zone.
trans-unit.target: 目标时区中与源时区中的 <paramref name="dateTime" /> 参数对应的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: When performing the conversion, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%2A> method applies any adjustment rules in effect in the `destinationTimeZoneId` time zone.
trans-unit.target: 当执行转换，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%2A>方法适用实际上在任何调整规则`destinationTimeZoneId`时区。

trans-unit.source: Although it is similar to the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, you can use <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> to specify the source and destination time zones using their identifiers instead of their <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> objects.
trans-unit.target: 尽管它是类似于<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，你可以使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定使用其标识符，而不是在源和目标时区其<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is most useful when you must convert a time without retrieving the time zone object that corresponds to it and you do not need to know whether the converted time is standard or daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: 当必须将时间转换而不检索与之相对应的时区对象而不需要知道转换后的时间是标准或夏时制，则此方法是最有用。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves the time zones whose identifiers are the `sourceTimeZoneId` and `destinationTimeZoneId` parameters from the registry.
trans-unit.target: 此方法检索时区标识符是`sourceTimeZoneId`和`destinationTimeZoneId`注册表中的参数。

trans-unit.source: It cannot retrieve time zone objects that are created using the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它不能检索使用创建的时区对象<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `dateTime` parameter must correspond to the `sourceTimeZoneId` parameter, as the following table shows.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`dateTime`参数必须对应于`sourceTimeZoneId`参数，如如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: DateTime.Kind value
trans-unit.target: DateTime.Kind 值

trans-unit.source: sourceTimeZone value
trans-unit.target: sourceTimeZone value

trans-unit.source: Method behavior
trans-unit.target: 方法行为

trans-unit.source: Equals `TimeZoneInfo.Utc.Id`.
trans-unit.target: 等于`TimeZoneInfo.Utc.Id`。

trans-unit.source: Converts `dateTime` to the destination time zone's time.
trans-unit.target: 将转换`dateTime`到目标时区的时间。

trans-unit.source: Does not equal `TimeZoneInfo.Utc.Id`.
trans-unit.target: 不等于`TimeZoneInfo.Utc.Id`。

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: Equals `TimeZoneInfo.Local.Id`.
trans-unit.target: 等于`TimeZoneInfo.Local.Id`。

trans-unit.source: Converts `dateTime` to the destination time zone's time.
trans-unit.target: 将转换`dateTime`到目标时区的时间。

trans-unit.source: Does not equal `TimeZoneInfo.Local.Id`.
trans-unit.target: 不等于`TimeZoneInfo.Local.Id`。

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: Any.
trans-unit.target: 任何。

trans-unit.source: Converts `dateTime` to the destination time zone's time.
trans-unit.target: 将转换`dateTime`到目标时区的时间。

trans-unit.source: Because it relies on calls to the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A> method, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%2A> method performs a case-insensitive search to locate the time zones that correspond to `sourceTimeZoneId` and `destinationTimeZoneId`.
trans-unit.target: 因为它依赖于调用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A>方法，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%2A>方法执行不区分大小写的搜索以找到对应的时区`sourceTimeZoneId`和`destinationTimeZoneId`。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `dateTime` parameter is an ambiguous time in the source time zone, it is interpreted as a standard time.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`dateTime`参数是源时区中不明确的时间，它被解释为标准时间。

trans-unit.source: If the `dateTime` parameter is an invalid time in the source time zone, this method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dateTime`参数是无效时间源时区中的，此方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType> unless the destination time zone is Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), in which case it is set to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>值设置为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>目标时区为协调世界时 (UTC)，除非在此情况下它设置为<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to display the time that corresponds to the local system time in eight cities of the world.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeBySystemTimeZoneId%28System.DateTime%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以显示该地区的八个城市本地系统时间所对应的时间。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> property of the <paramref name="dateTime" /> parameter does not correspond to the source time zone.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dateTime" /> 参数的 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> 属性与源时区不对应。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The user does not have the permissions required to read from the registry keys that hold time zone data.
trans-unit.target: 用户没有读取包含时区数据的注册表项所需的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="sourceTimeZoneId" /> identifier was not found on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 在本地系统上找不到 <paramref name="sourceTimeZoneId" /> 标识符。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="destinationTimeZoneId" /> identifier was not found on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 在本地系统上找不到 <paramref name="destinationTimeZoneId" /> 标识符。

trans-unit.source: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The time zone to convert <c>dateTime</c> to.
trans-unit.target: <c>dateTime</c> 要转换到的时区。

trans-unit.source: Converts a Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to the time in a specified time zone.
trans-unit.target: 将协调世界时 (UTC) 转换为指定时区中的时间。

trans-unit.source: The date and time in the destination time zone.
trans-unit.target: 目标时区的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: Its <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> property is <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Utc" /> if <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> is <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc" />; otherwise, its <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> property is <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> 为 <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc" />，则其 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> 属性为 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Utc" />；否则其 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> 属性为 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified" />。

trans-unit.source: When performing the conversion, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeFromUtc%2A> method applies any adjustment rules in effect in the `destinationTimeZone` time zone.
trans-unit.target: 当执行转换，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeFromUtc%2A>方法适用实际上在任何调整规则`destinationTimeZone`时区。

trans-unit.source: The precise behavior of this method depends on the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `dateTime` parameter, as the following table shows.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的确切行为取决于值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`dateTime`参数，如如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: DateTime.Kind property
trans-unit.target: DateTime.Kind 属性

trans-unit.source: Conversion
trans-unit.target: 转换

trans-unit.source: Throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType> 或 <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Converts from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 从协调世界时 (UTC) 转换。

trans-unit.source: If the conversion of `dateTime` results in a date and time value that is earlier than <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or later than <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果转换`dateTime`结果日期和时间值早于<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>或晚于<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，此方法返回<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>分别。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) to Central Time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将协调世界时 (UTC) 转换为中部时间。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> property of <paramref name="dateTime" /> is <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Local" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dateTime" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> 属性为 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Local" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, this method applies only the current adjustment rule to the time zone conversion if <paramref name="destinationTimeZone" /> is <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />.
trans-unit.target: 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系统，此方法将仅在当前的调整规则应用到时区转换如果<paramref name="destinationTimeZone" />是<see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the method may not accurately convert times for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect.
trans-unit.target: 因此，该方法可能无法准确转换之前当前的调整规则生效的时间。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Notes for Callers section in the <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的调用节说明<see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Converts a date and time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 将日期和时间转换为协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified date and time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 将指定的日期和时间转换为协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) that corresponds to the <paramref name="dateTime" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与 <paramref name="dateTime" /> 参数对应的协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value's <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> property is always set to <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Utc" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值的 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> 属性始终设置为 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Utc" />。

trans-unit.source: The exact conversion performed depends on the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `dateTime` parameter, as the following table shows.
trans-unit.target: 执行完全转换取决于值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`dateTime`参数，如如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: DateTime.Kind property
trans-unit.target: DateTime.Kind 属性

trans-unit.source: Conversion
trans-unit.target: 转换

trans-unit.source: Converts from local time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 从本地时间转换为协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: Assumes `dateTime` is local time and converts from local time to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 假定`dateTime`为本地时间，并将从本地时间转换为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: Returns `dateTime` unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 返回`dateTime`不变。

trans-unit.source: If `dateTime` corresponds to an ambiguous local time, this method assumes that it is standard local time.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dateTime`对应于不明确的本地时间，此方法假定它是标准的本地时间。

trans-unit.source: If `dateTime` corresponds to an invalid local time, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dateTime`对应于无效的本地时间，该方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the current computer's local time zone includes multiple adjustment rules, this overload of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeToUtc%2A> method can return results that differ from the <xref:System.TimeZone.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前计算机的本地时区包括多个调整规则，此重载<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeToUtc%2A>方法可以返回与不同的结果<xref:System.TimeZone.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TimeZone.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> always applies the current adjustment rule to time zone conversion, whether or not `dateTime` lies within its date range.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZone.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 始终将当前的调整规则是否应用到时区转换`dateTime`在其日期范围内。

trans-unit.source: And when executing on [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)], <xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> also applies the current adjustment rule to time zone conversion, whether or not `dateTime` lies within its date range.
trans-unit.target: 和上执行时[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]，<xref:System.DateTime.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>也适用于时区转换，当前的调整规则，是否`dateTime`在其日期范围内。

trans-unit.source: If the UTC equivalent of `dateTime` is earlier than <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or later that <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> or <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果 UTC 等效于`dateTime`早于<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>或更高版本， <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，此方法返回<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>或<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>分别。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the conversion of time values whose <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的转换时间值的<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>分别。

trans-unit.source: It also illustrates the conversion of ambiguous and invalid times.
trans-unit.target: 它还说明了不明确和无效时间的转换。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="TimeZoneInfo.Local.IsInvalidDateTime(" /> <paramref name="dateTime" /> <see langword=")" /> returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="TimeZoneInfo.Local.IsInvalidDateTime(" /> <paramref name="dateTime" /> <see langword=")" /> 返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, this method applies only the current adjustment rule to the time zone conversion.
trans-unit.target: 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系统，此方法仅在当前的调整规则应用于时区转换。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the method may not accurately convert times for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect.
trans-unit.target: 因此，该方法可能无法准确转换之前当前的调整规则生效的时间。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Notes for Callers section in the <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的调用节说明<see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />属性。

trans-unit.source: The date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The time zone of <c>dateTime</c>.
trans-unit.target: <c>dateTime</c> 的时区。

trans-unit.source: Converts the time in a specified time zone to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 将指定时区中的时间转换为协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) that corresponds to the <paramref name="dateTime" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 与 <paramref name="dateTime" /> 参数对应的协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object's <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> property is always set to <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Utc" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象的 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Kind" /> 属性始终设置为 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Utc" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `dateTime` parameter equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the `sourceTimeZone` parameter equals <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns `dateTime` without performing any conversion.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`dateTime`参数等于<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>和`sourceTimeZone`参数等于<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，此方法返回`dateTime`而不执行任何转换。

trans-unit.source: If `dateTime` corresponds to an ambiguous time, this method assumes that it is the standard time of the source time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dateTime`对应到不明确的时间，此方法假定它是与源时区的标准时间。

trans-unit.source: If `dateTime` corresponds to an invalid time, this method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dateTime`对应于时间无效，此方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: If the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) equivalent of `dateTime` is earlier than <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> or later that <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns <xref:System.DateTime.MinValue> or <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果的协调世界时 (UTC) 等效项`dateTime`早于<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>或更高版本， <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，此方法返回<xref:System.DateTime.MinValue>或<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>分别。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the current date from the local system and converts it to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), then converts it to Tokyo Standard Time, and finally converts from Tokyo Standard Time back to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例从本地系统中检索当前日期和将其转换为协调世界时 (UTC)，然后将其转换到东京标准时间，并且最后将从东京标准时间转换回 UTC。

trans-unit.source: Note that the two UTC times are identical.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这两个的 UTC 时间相同。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dateTime" /> <see langword=".Kind" /> is <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Utc" /> and <paramref name="sourceTimeZone" /> does not equal <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dateTime" /> <see langword=".Kind" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Utc" />，而 <paramref name="sourceTimeZone" /> 不等于 <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Utc" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dateTime" /><see langword=".Kind" /> is <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Local" /> and <paramref name="sourceTimeZone" /> does not equal <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dateTime" /><see langword=".Kind" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeKind.Local" />，并且 <paramref name="sourceTimeZone" /> 不等于 <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] systems, the method applies only the current adjustment rule to the time zone conversion if <paramref name="sourceTimeZone" /> is <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />.
trans-unit.target: 上[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]系统，该方法将只是将当前的调整规则应用到时区转换如果<paramref name="sourceTimeZone" />是<see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" />。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the method may not accurately convert times for periods before the current adjustment rule came into effect.
trans-unit.target: 因此，该方法可能无法准确转换之前当前的调整规则生效的时间。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Notes for Callers section in the <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Local" /> property.

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> method is suitable for creating a time zone that has no adjustments (that is, a time zone that does not support daylight saving time).

trans-unit.source: To define a time zone that includes adjustments for daylight saving time, use either the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要定义包括调整夏令时的时区，使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the time zone's standard time name and its identifier are the same.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，时区的标准时间名称和其标识符是相同的。

trans-unit.source: However, the length of the time zone's identifier should not exceed 32 characters.
trans-unit.target: 但是，时区的标识符的长度不应超过 32 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The string passed to the `displayName` parameter follows a fairly standard format.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串传递到`displayName`参数遵循标准格式。

trans-unit.source: The first portion of the display name is the time zone's base offset from Coordinated Universal Time, which is indicated by the acronym GMT (for Greenwich Mean Time), enclosed in parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 显示名称的第一个部分是时区的基本偏移量从协调世界时，这将由的首字母缩写格林威治标准时间 （格林威治标准时间），用括号括起来。

trans-unit.source: This is followed by a string that identifies the time zone itself, or one or more of the cities, regions, or countries in the time zone, or both.
trans-unit.target: 紧接着的是一个字符串，标识时区本身，一个或多个城市、 地区或时区中的国家/地区和/或文件名。

trans-unit.target: 显示名称的第一个部分是时区的基本偏移量从协调世界时，这将由的首字母缩写格林威治标准时间 （格林威治标准时间），用括号括起来。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: The `baseUtcOffset` parameter defines the custom time zone's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) for all of the time zone's adjustment rules.
trans-unit.target: `baseUtcOffset`参数定义自定义时区的偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC) 的所有时区的调整规则。

trans-unit.source: In other words, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object model assumes that the time zone's offset from UTC is constant throughout the life of the time zone, and exists independent of particular adjustment rules.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象模型假定相对于 UTC 的时区偏移量是常量的时区，整个生存期，并且存在独立于特定的调整规则。

trans-unit.source: To reflect a time zone that has changed its offset from UTC, you must create a new time zone object.
trans-unit.target: 以反映已更改其相对于 UTC 的时区，必须创建一个新的时区对象。

trans-unit.source: A time zone's adjustment rules are defined by doing the following:
trans-unit.target: 时区的调整规则通过执行以下定义：

trans-unit.source: Calling either the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime.CreateFloatingDateRule%2A> or the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime.CreateFixedDateRule%2A> method to define the starting and ending transition time for each adjustment rule.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime.CreateFloatingDateRule%2A>或<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime.CreateFixedDateRule%2A>方法以定义开始和结束转换为每个调整规则的时间。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.CreateAdjustmentRule%2A> method for each adjustment rule.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.CreateAdjustmentRule%2A>为每个调整规则的方法。

trans-unit.source: Assigning the adjustment rules to an array that can be passed as the `adjustmentRules` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 数组分配的调整规则可以作为传递`adjustmentRules`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a custom time zone for the Palmer station and Anvers Island in Antarctica.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例在南极洲中创建一个自定义的时区，Palmer 工作站和安特卫普岛。

trans-unit.source: Creates a custom time zone with a specified identifier, an offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC), a display name, a standard time name, a daylight saving time name, daylight saving time rules, and a value that indicates whether the returned object reflects daylight saving time information.
trans-unit.target: 创建带指定标识符的自定义时区、与协调世界时 (UTC) 的偏移量、显示名称、标准时间名称、夏令制名称、夏令制规则以及指示返回的对象是否反映夏令制信息的值。

trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="disableDaylightSavingTime" /> 参数为 <see langword="true" />，则返回的对象没有夏令制数据。

trans-unit.source: You can use this overload of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create a custom time zone whose support for daylight saving time can be determined by conditions at run time.

trans-unit.source: It sets the `disableDaylightSavingTime` parameter in the call to the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 它将设置`disableDaylightSavingTime`对的调用中的参数<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法`true`。

trans-unit.source: It then displays the new time zone's daylight saving time name, if one is present, and the number of adjustment rules to confirm that the new time zone has no daylight saving time information.
trans-unit.target: 它将显示新时区的夏令制名称，如果存在和的调整规则，以确认新时区具有任何夏令制信息的数目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the display name for the current time zone's daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前时区的夏令时的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The display name for the time zone's daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: 时区的夏令时的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The display name is localized based on the culture installed with the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: 根据安装 Windows 操作系统的区域性进行本地化的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.DaylightName%2A> property whose value is not <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> or `null` does not necessarily indicate that the time zone supports daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.DaylightName%2A>属性的值不是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>或`null`不一定表示时区支持夏令制。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether the time zone supports daylight saving time, check the value of its <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.SupportsDaylightSavingTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否时区支持夏令制，检查的值其<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.SupportsDaylightSavingTime%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.DaylightName%2A> property of time zones defined in the registry is not <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType> or `null`.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.DaylightName%2A>的注册表中定义的时区的属性不是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>或`null`。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.DaylightName%2A> property of custom time zones can be set to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.DaylightName%2A>的自定义时区的属性可以设置为<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This occurs when custom time zones are created by the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule%5B%5D%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> overload and the `disableDaylightSavingTime` parameter is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当创建自定义时区时将发生这种情况<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%28System.String%2CSystem.TimeSpan%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule%5B%5D%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>重载和`disableDaylightSavingTime`参数是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, your code should never assume that the value of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.DaylightName%2A> property is not `null` or empty.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你的代码应该永远不会假定的值<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.DaylightName%2A>属性不是`null`或为空。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.DaylightName%2A> property is equivalent to the <xref:System.TimeZone.DaylightName%2A> property of the <xref:System.TimeZone> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.DaylightName%2A>属性等效于<xref:System.TimeZone.DaylightName%2A>属性<xref:System.TimeZone>类。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a method named `DisplayDateWithTimeZoneName` that uses the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.IsDaylightSavingTime%28System.DateTime%29> method to determine whether to display a time zone's standard time name or daylight saving time name.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义一个名为方法`DisplayDateWithTimeZoneName`使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.IsDaylightSavingTime%28System.DateTime%29>方法来确定是否显示时区的标准时间名称或夏时制名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the general display name that represents the time zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示时区的一般显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The time zone's general display name.
trans-unit.target: 时区的一般显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The display name is localized based on the culture installed with the Windows operating system.
trans-unit.target: 根据安装 Windows 操作系统的区域性进行本地化的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: Time zone display names for Windows system time zones follow a fairly standard format.
trans-unit.target: Windows 系统时区的时区显示名称遵循标准格式。

trans-unit.source: The first portion of the display name is the time zone's base offset from Coordinated Universal Time, which is indicated by the acronym GMT (for Greenwich Mean Time), enclosed in parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 显示名称的第一个部分是时区的基本偏移量从协调世界时，这将由的首字母缩写格林威治标准时间 （格林威治标准时间），用括号括起来。

trans-unit.source: For Coordinated Universal Time, the GMT acronym with no offset is enclosed in parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 为协调世界时，没有偏移量的格林威治标准时间首字母缩写括在括号中。

trans-unit.source: This is followed by a string that identifies the time zone or one or more of the cities, regions, or countries in the time zone.
trans-unit.target: 紧接着的是一个字符串，标识时区或一个或多个城市、 地区或时区中的国家/地区。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象，表示本地时区，并输出其显示名称、 标准时间名称和夏时制名称。

trans-unit.source: The output is displayed for a system in the U.S. Pacific Standard Time zone.
trans-unit.target: 输出显示为在美国太平洋时区中的系统太平洋标准时区运行。

trans-unit.target: 此方法将转换或强制转换`obj`到<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象，并将其与当前实例进行比较。

trans-unit.source: The test for equality is based on a comparison of values.
trans-unit.target: 相等性测试基于值的比较。

trans-unit.target: 当前<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>实例和`obj`视为可在以下情况下相等：

trans-unit.target: 运行时类型`obj`是<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>。

trans-unit.target: 两个对象具有相同<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Id%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The two objects have the same adjustment rules.
trans-unit.target: 两个对象具有相同的调整规则。

trans-unit.source: If `obj` is `null`, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `obj` 为 `null`，则此方法返回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: They have the same adjustment rules.

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.Equals%28System.TimeZoneInfo%29>方法来确定本地时区为太平洋标准时间还是东部时间。

trans-unit.source: The time zone identifier, which corresponds to the <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Id" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 时区标识符，它对应于 <see cref="P:System.TimeZoneInfo.Id" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo" /> object from the registry based on its identifier.
trans-unit.target: 根据其标识符从注册表中检索 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object whose identifier is the value of the <paramref name="id" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其标识符为 <paramref name="id" /> 参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The `id` parameter must correspond exactly to the time zone's registry key in length, but not in case, for a successful match to occur; that is, the comparison of `id` with time zone identifiers is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: `id`参数必须精确对应于时区的注册表项的长度，但不是在情况下，若发生; 成功匹配，即比较`id`时区标识符是不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If you want to retrieve time zone objects based on partial matches, you can write custom procedures that work with the read-only collection of <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> objects returned by the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要检索时区对象基于部分匹配项，则可以编写使用的只读集合的自定义过程<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>返回的对象<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A> tries to match `id` to the subkey names of the HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time Zones branch of the registry under Windows XP and Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A> 尝试匹配`id`下的 Windows XP 和 Windows Vista 的 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Time 区域分支的子项名称。

trans-unit.source: This branch does not necessarily contain a comprehensive list of time zone identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 此分支不一定包含时区标识符的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: If required by an application, you can create a particular time zone either by calling one of the overloads of the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A> method or by calling <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A> to deserialize a <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object that represents the required time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序所需，则可以创建特定时区通过调用的重载之一<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A>方法或通过调用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A>进行反序列化<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象，表示所需的时间区域。

trans-unit.source: However, time zones created by these method calls are not included in the registry and cannot be retrieved using the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 但是，由这些方法调用的时区不包含在注册表中并不能使用检索<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: These custom time zones can be accessed only through the object reference returned by the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A> or <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: 可以仅通过返回的对象引用访问这些自定义时区<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.CreateCustomTimeZone%2A>或<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A>方法调用。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A> method to retrieve the Tokyo Standard Time zone.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById%2A>方法来检索东京标准时区。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> object is then used to convert the local time to the time in Tokyo and to determine whether it is Tokyo Standard Time or Tokyo Daylight Time.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>以将本地时间的时间转换在东京并确定它是否是东京标准时间还是东京夏时制时间，然后使用对象。

trans-unit.source: The system does not have enough memory to hold information about the time zone.
trans-unit.target: 系统没有足够的内存来存放有关时区的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="id" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="id" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The time zone identifier specified by <paramref name="id" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到 <paramref name="id" /> 指定的时区标识符。

trans-unit.source: This means that a registry key whose name matches <paramref name="id" /> does not exist, or that the key exists but does not contain any time zone data.
trans-unit.target: 这表示名称与 <paramref name="id" /> 匹配的注册表项不存在，或者该项存在但不包含任何时区数据。

trans-unit.source: The process does not have the permissions required to read from the registry key that contains the time zone information.
trans-unit.target: 该进程没有读取包含时区信息的注册表项所需的权限。

trans-unit.source: The time zone identifier was found, but the registry data is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: 时区标识符已找到，但注册表数据已损坏。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of the serialized <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 已序列化的 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo" /> 对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Deserializes a string to re-create an original serialized <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 反序列化一个字符串，以重新创建原始的已序列化的 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The original serialized object.
trans-unit.target: 原始序列化对象。

trans-unit.source: There is an alternative to providing all the code required to create a time zone that is not found in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 没有提供创建同一时区，在注册表中找不到所需的所有代码的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: You can define a custom time zone and either use the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ToSerializedString%2A> method in a standalone executable or use an application's setup program to save the time zone as a string.
trans-unit.target: 你可以定义自定义的时区，然后使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ToSerializedString%2A>独立可执行文件或使用应用程序的安装程序也将时区另存为一个字符串中的方法。

trans-unit.source: The application can then retrieve this string from its storage location and instantiate it using the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然后，应用程序可以从其存储位置检索此字符串并使用其进行实例化<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.FromSerializedString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example tries to retrieve the Antarctica/South Pole time zone from the local system.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例尝试检索南极从本地系统的时区。

trans-unit.source: If it fails, the code tries to retrieve information about the time zone from a text file in the application directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果失败，该代码将尝试从应用程序目录中的文本文件中检索有关时区的信息。

trans-unit.source: If this attempt fails, the code creates the time zone and writes information about the time zone to the text file.
trans-unit.target: 如果此尝试失败，代码将创建时区，并将有关时区的信息写入文本文件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> parameter is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 参数为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="source" /> parameter is a null string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> 参数为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The source parameter cannot be deserialized back into a <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 无法将源参数反序列化回 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule" /> objects that apply to the current <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 检索应用至当前 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects for this time zone.
trans-unit.target: 此时区的对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetAdjustmentRules%2A> method retrieves an array of <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule?displayProperty=nameWithType> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetAdjustmentRules%2A>方法检索的数组<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule?displayProperty=nameWithType>对象。

trans-unit.source: Each object in the array defines the effective start and end date of that time zone adjustment, as well as its delta (the exact amount by which the adjustment causes the time to change).
trans-unit.target: 数组中的每个对象定义该时区调整，以及其增量生效的开始和结束日期 （的确切数据量依据进行此调整会导致更改的时间）。

trans-unit.source: In addition, two properties return <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime?displayProperty=nameWithType> objects that define when each annual transition to and from standard time occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此外，两个属性返回<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime?displayProperty=nameWithType>定义每个每年何时从标准时间与转换发生时的对象。

trans-unit.source: If a time zone has multiple adjustment rules, they are generally ordered from earliest (at index 0) to latest (at index <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> – 1).
trans-unit.target: 如果时区具有多个调整规则，它们通常排序从最早 （位于索引 0 处） 到最新 (索引处<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>– 1)。

trans-unit.source: If a time zone has no adjustment rules, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetAdjustmentRules%2A> method returns an empty array (an array whose <xref:System.Array.Length%2A> is zero).
trans-unit.target: 如果时区具有没有调整规则，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetAdjustmentRules%2A>方法返回一个空数组 (数组其<xref:System.Array.Length%2A>为零)。

trans-unit.source: Any modifications to the elements of the array returned by the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetAdjustmentRules%2A> method are not reflected in the adjustment rules that belong to a particular time zone.
trans-unit.target: 对返回的数组的元素进行任何修改<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetAdjustmentRules%2A>方法不会反映在属于特定时区的调整规则。

trans-unit.source: To modify a time zone's adjustment rules (such as to reflect its historical transition to and from daylight saving time) you must create a new time zone with the appropriate adjustment rules, rather than modify the existing one.
trans-unit.target: 若要修改时区的调整规则 （例如反映到 / 从夏令时其历史转换） 您必须使用适当的调整规则中，创建新的时区而不修改现有的一个。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves all time zones that are defined on the local system and displays complete information about their adjustment rules to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索在本地系统，并显示完整信息到控制台其调整规则定义的所有时区。

trans-unit.source: The system does not have enough memory to make an in-memory copy of the adjustment rules.
trans-unit.target: 系统内存不足，无法在内存中创建调整规则副本。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the possible dates and times that an ambiguous date and time can be mapped to.
trans-unit.target: 返回不明确的日期和时间可能映射到的日期和时间的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: A date and time.
trans-unit.target: 日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the possible dates and times that an ambiguous date and time can be mapped to.
trans-unit.target: 返回不明确的日期和时间可能映射到的日期和时间的相关信息。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects that represents possible Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offsets that a particular date and time can be mapped to.
trans-unit.target: 对象的数组，它表示特定日期和时间可以映射到的可能的协调世界时 (UTC) 偏移量。

trans-unit.target: 此方法的确切行为取决于之间的关系<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性和<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>对象，作为如下表所示。

trans-unit.target: TimeZoneInfo 对象类型

trans-unit.target: 类型的属性值

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行为

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType> 或 <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Returns ambiguous time offsets for `dateTime`.
trans-unit.target: 返回不明确的时间偏移量`dateTime`。

trans-unit.source: Converts `dateTime` to the local time, and then returns ambiguous time offsets for that time.
trans-unit.target: 将转换`dateTime`为本地时间，然后返回该时间的偏移量不明确的时间。

trans-unit.source: Any value.
trans-unit.target: 任意值。

trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: Any other time zone.
trans-unit.target: 任何其他时区。
